text: These recommendations (except for those on thermal ablation, published later in 2019) were consolidated in the 2014 second edition of Comprehensive cervical cancer control: a guide to essential practice $( 5 ) ,$ which also includes the WHO recommendations for HPV vaccination, treatment of cervical cancer and palliative care.
